list_definition.definition: to show; to display to the public

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My picture is to be exhibited in the art gallery.
He exhibited a complete lack of concern for others.

list_definition.definition: an object displayed publicly (eg in a museum)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: One of the exhibits is missing.

list_definition.definition: an object or document produced in court as part of the evidence

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The blood-stained scarf was exhibit number one in the murder trial.
